data.text:
One day―― On the door of the trainer's office, 
there was a reserved knock on the door.
data.processed:
<story>One day―― On the door of the trainer's office, 
<story>there was a reserved knock on the door.

choices.text: I'm glad you came, Dober
Of course, Dober

data.text:
Well…… have you…… changed your mind? 
Do you…… still plan to support me?
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: I'm glad you came, Dober
Of course, Dober

data.processed:
<story>Well…… have you…… changed your mind? 
<story>Do you…… still plan to support me?

data.text:
I-it's not that, I just……! I just…… want 
to win. I want to be able to win……!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>I-it's not that, I just……! I just…… want 
<story>to win. I want to be able to win……!

data.text: ……Thank you. In that case-!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>……Thank you. In that case-!

data.text: Please…… Train me. So I can win.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>Please…… Train me. So I can win.

data.text: Please…… Train me. So I can win.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>Please…… Train me. So I can win.

data.text:
The next mock race…… I want to win it, for Trainer, 
because it's probably my last chance……
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: Together, we'll win for sure

data.processed:
<story>The next mock race…… I want to win it, for Trainer, 
<story>because it's probably my last chance……

data.text: ……Yeah.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>……Yeah.

data.text: Yeah……!!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>Yeah……!!

data.text:
And like that―― Together with Mejiro Dober, the harsh training 
for the upcoming mock race began.
data.processed:
<story>And like that―― Together with Mejiro Dober, the harsh training 
<story>for the upcoming mock race began.

data.text:
And like that―― Together with Mejiro Dober, the harsh training 
for the upcoming mock race began.
data.processed:
<story>And like that―― Together with Mejiro Dober, the harsh training 
<story>for the upcoming mock race began.

data.text:
Originally, she was someone that possessed an amazing potential. 
While she had that, her abilities themselves were still 
progressing favorably every day, but――

choices.text: That was a good time, Dober
That was a good time, Dober

data.processed:
<story>Originally, she was someone that possessed an amazing potential. 
<story>While she had that, her abilities themselves were still 
<story>progressing favorably every day, but――

data.text: Is that so?…… But, yeah.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>Is that so?…… But, yeah.

data.text: Thanks, even I thought that one just now was good. But――
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>Thanks, even I thought that one just now was good. But――

data.text:
In the end, in front of a crowd…… for a real race, will I still 
be able to run like this? ……That's the problem, isn't it?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>In the end, in front of a crowd…… for a real race, will I still 
<story>be able to run like this? ……That's the problem, isn't it?

data.text:
In the end, in front of a crowd…… for a real race, will I still 
be able to run like this? ……That's the problem, isn't it?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>In the end, in front of a crowd…… for a real race, will I still 
<story>be able to run like this? ……That's the problem, isn't it?

data.text: ――I'm going to run 1 more lap. Time it, please.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>――I'm going to run 1 more lap. Time it, please.

data.text:
As if saying that to keep up appearances, she dashed off. It's 
true, that she's carrying a deep-rooted mental problem.

choices.text: Even if it's small, there has to be something……
choices.processed: <size=34>Even if it's small, there has to be something……</size>

data.processed:
<story>As if saying that to keep up appearances, she dashed off. It's 
<story>true, that she's carrying a deep-rooted mental problem.

data.text:
While thinking that, I once again returned to watching her run. 
At that moment…… I came to realize something.
data.processed:
<story>While thinking that, I once again returned to watching her run. 
<story>At that moment…… I came to realize something.

data.text: Haa, haa, haa―!!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>Haa, haa, haa―!!

data.text:
It was not only something related to the talk just now. Even 
during these days of training while, as the sub-trainer, I've 
been watching over her, this whole time she's――

choices.text: (Never looked at the spectator's seats, has she?)
choices.processed: <size=33>(Never looked at the spectator's seats, has she?)</size>

data.processed:
<story>It was not only something related to the talk just now. Even 
<story>during these days of training while, as the sub-trainer, I've 
<story>been watching over her, this whole time she's――

data.text:
……Isn't that how it usually is? While running, 
you're supposed to focus on the race, right?
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: I think you're too focused on 『Not Looking』
choices.processed: <size=36>I think you're too focused on 『Not Looking』</size>

data.processed:
<story>……Isn't that how it usually is? While running, 
<story>you're supposed to focus on the race, right?

data.text:
Rather, by 『Not Looking』, by focusing so much on that, it seems 
to be the cause of her stiffness while running.
data.processed:
<story>Rather, by 『Not Looking』, by focusing so much on that, it seems 
<story>to be the cause of her stiffness while running.

data.text: ……That's……
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: ……About the next race, before the start
choices.processed: <size=41>……About the next race, before the start</size>

choices.text: ……About the next race, before the start
choices.processed: <size=41>……About the next race, before the start</size>

data.processed: <story>……That's……

data.text: Before the start…… what?
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: Just for a second, look at the spectators
choices.processed: <size=41>Just for a second, look at the spectators</size>

data.processed: <story>Before the start…… what?

data.text: Ha?! I-I can't……! Because, I――
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: From there, I'll be watching you
From there, I'll be watching you

data.processed: <story>Ha?! I-I can't……! Because, I――

data.text: But……!
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: I'll be watching the 『Strong』 Dober

data.processed: <story>But……!

data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>……!

data.text: And like that―― finally, the day of the mock race had arrived.
data.processed: <story>And like that―― finally, the day of the mock race had arrived.

data.text: Hyaaa……! There are quite a lot of spectators, aren't there～?!
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>Hyaaa……! There are quite a lot of spectators, aren't there～?!

data.text:
It's probably because Chief Trainer's retirement has become the 
subject of rumors. Recruiting Dober is probably the reason most 
of the trainers came.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>It's probably because Chief Trainer's retirement has become the 
<story>subject of rumors. Recruiting Dober is probably the reason most 
<story>of the trainers came.

data.text:
The difficulty she has in races is already well known but―― Even 
with that, just like you, she's a Mejiro Uma Musume. Attracting 
attention is unavoidable.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>The difficulty she has in races is already well known but―― Even 
<story>with that, just like you, she's a Mejiro Uma Musume. Attracting 
<story>attention is unavoidable.

data.text:
That's right…… Dober, I wonder if she's okay……? That girl, she's 
always pushing herself…… if it leads to an injury……!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>That's right…… Dober, I wonder if she's okay……? That girl, she's 
<story>always pushing herself…… if it leads to an injury……!

data.text: Hmmm～……No, Ryan-oneesama. I'm sure she'll be fine.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>Hmmm～……No, Ryan-oneesama. I'm sure she'll be fine.

data.text: That's true. Today, Dober―― her demeanor seems different.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: <story>That's true. Today, Dober―― her demeanor seems different.

data.text: Bell-chan……
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed: <story>Bell-chan……

data.text:
(Trainer…… she's definitely, come to watch, hasn't she? ……I want 
to win. I want to win, I want to win, today for sure……!)
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>(Trainer…… she's definitely, come to watch, hasn't she? ……I want 
<story>to win. I want to win, I want to win, today for sure……!)

data.text: (But…… I can't, again, my heartbeat…… it's too noisy……!)
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: Dober! Over here!
Dober! Over here!

data.processed: <story>(But…… I can't, again, my heartbeat…… it's too noisy……!)

data.text: (Ah…… I looked…… at the spectator seats……)
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>(Ah…… I looked…… at the spectator seats……)

data.text: (They're…… over there――!)
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: Dober! You'll be fine, you're strong!
Dober! You'll be fine, you're strong!

data.processed: <story>(They're…… over there――!)

data.text: Ah…… how many time do you plan on saying that? Dummy……!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>Ah…… how many time do you plan on saying that? Dummy……!

data.text: Ah…… that's right. That person, really…… thinks that I'm……!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>Ah…… that's right. That person, really…… thinks that I'm……!

data.text:
And so, the last mock race that Chief Trainer would 
be watching over her, had finally begun.
data.processed:
<story>And so, the last mock race that Chief Trainer would 
<story>be watching over her, had finally begun.

data.text:
And so, the last mock race that Chief Trainer would 
be watching over her, had finally begun.
data.processed:
<story>And so, the last mock race that Chief Trainer would 
<story>be watching over her, had finally begun.
<story>(――Bam!!)

data.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa――
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>Haa, haa, haa, haa――

data.text:
(The sound of my heartbeat, still hasn't settled. ……Honestly, I 
can't say I'm running as well as during training)
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>(The sound of my heartbeat, still hasn't settled. ……Honestly, I 
<story>can't say I'm running as well as during training)

data.text:
(I hate being in front of people. Their gazes, voices, presence―― 
all of that, every single one of them, I can't help but feel like 
they're laughing at my weakness……)
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>(I hate being in front of people. Their gazes, voices, presence―― 
<story>all of that, every single one of them, I can't help but feel like 
<story>they're laughing at my weakness……)

data.text: But…… Aaaaaaaaaahhh!!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>But…… Aaaaaaaaaahhh!!

data.text:
(But, even with that! There! They're over there! 
People who…… believe, that I'm strong!)
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>(But, even with that! There! They're over there! 
<story>People who…… believe, that I'm strong!)

data.text: I am strong…… I am strong, I am strong!!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>I am strong…… I am strong, I am strong!!

data.text: I am! A strong Uma Musumeeeeeeeeee!!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>I am! A strong Uma Musumeeeeeeeeee!!

data.text: (WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!)
data.processed: <story>(WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!)

data.text:
First place……! Bell-chan…… that was a magnificent 
run……! I'm glad. With this, finally, you――
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
<story>First place……! Bell-chan…… that was a magnificent 
<story>run……! I'm glad. With this, finally, you――

data.text: Trainer. Today…… really, thank you very much for coming.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>Trainer. Today…… really, thank you very much for coming.

data.text:
Fufu, I should be the one thanking you. Seeing you win, made me 
very happy…… thanks to that, I have noooo more regrets.
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Fufu, I should be the one thanking you. Seeing you win, made me 
<story>very happy…… thanks to that, I have noooo more regrets.

data.text:
……Ah, that's a lie, there's one more thing. Bell-chan, 
what do you plan to do from now on?
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
<story>……Ah, that's a lie, there's one more thing. Bell-chan, 
<story>what do you plan to do from now on?

data.text: Well, I――
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>Well, I――

data.text: Together with this person, I plan to continue on.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>Together with this person, I plan to continue on.

data.text:
……Now that we've come this far, you're not 
going to say 『No』, right, Trainer?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>……Now that we've come this far, you're not 
<story>going to say 『No』, right, Trainer?

data.text: That's fine, right?…… Trainer.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>That's fine, right?…… Trainer.

data.text:
And with that―― with Chief Trainer watching over us, a contract 
to be Mejiro Dober's trainer was signed!
data.processed:
<story>And with that―― with Chief Trainer watching over us, a contract 
<story>to be Mejiro Dober's trainer was signed!

data.text:
And with that―― with Chief Trainer watching over us, a contract 
to be Mejiro Dober's trainer was signed!
data.processed:
<story>And with that―― with Chief Trainer watching over us, a contract
